title: No ringtone or notification sounds
content:
Hello my Google Pixel 4 has stopped making ringtone sound and notification sounds, and some days ago started to make weird sounds while recording, like a low buzzing noise. The ringtone and notification issue has been going on for maybe two weeks where it happened while I was watching a youtube video. The sound of the video suddenly cut off for a little bit making weird noises and got back to normal. But after that I don't get notifications or calls, missing the whole purpose of having a phone- that it rings. It also stopped vibrating with calls so I have no idea when someone calls me. It is quite frustrating. 

What I have tried to fix it:
- Checked do not disturb, no it is not on- I have turned up the volume.
- Changed ringtone or notification sound, no it did not work they don't even preview. But I can play media sounds.
- Turned off and on my phone
- Factory reset
- Safe mode

I do get notification sounds if I am playing media sounds and it overlaps, but the ringing does not do that.

I bought my phone around 7th December.
